item.description:
This is going to be a 3 to 5k run/walk, slow pace, all levels welcome!

The starting point is the park at the intersection of JFK Street and Memorial Drive. The closest (free) parking I can think of is on Mt Auburn St which isn't too far away. There's also parking in the Harvard Square area, but you'll have to drive around. If I think of more parking tips I'll post them later.

We will loop around the Charles for between 3 to 5k depending on what folks want to do.

Please come even if you're not a great runner - I'm not either!
item.name: Casual Saturday Run - on the Charles
